briefTitle: A Study to Determine Biopsy Rate in Participants With a First Relapse of Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Percentage of biopsied participants with metastatic relapse
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Participants with histologically confirmed breast cancer treated for early breast cancer (eBC) with first metastatic relapse disease in the period from January 1, 2014 and December 31, 2015

Exclusion Criteria:

Not Applicable
